markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Leopard's Armor](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1089)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Chain Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Made of cobalt-colored steel rings that flow down the entire length of the garment, this _+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [chain mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9)_ includes an armored face covering. The armor is said to be based on the same armor once worn by Azure Leopard, one of Old-Mage Jatembe's magic warriors.

<document level="2" id="action-887" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Leopard's Armor
